articles.title: Man who used to rent 1BR Boon Keng condo for $2.2K says agent found new tenant in 2 weeks who’ll pay $3.9K
articles.description: Netizens commented about how expensive housing is with one person saying that it was horrible to come back to what was akin to a rathole after working the whole day and that too at a rental of $2.5k
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: “The property market is nuts,” wrote one Reddit user who said that he had decided to leave Singapore because life has become too expensive.
To his surprise, the one-bedroom condominium he had been renting for $2,200 a month was snapped up ... [2550 chars]

articles.title: Condo and HDB flat rentals in Singapore rise again but at slower pace in January
articles.description:
Fewer deals were closed during the Chinese New Year holidays.
Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE – Rents for condominiums and Housing Board flats continue to rise but at a slower pace in January.
Condo rents climbed by 1.4 per cent from December, posting the lowest increase in the past 11 months, while HDB rents rose marginally by 0.6 ... [2790 chars]

articles.description:
The move comes amid a spate of delistings on the Singapore Exchange.

articles.content:

articles.title: HDB Price Guide: Most Expensive HDB Estates In 2022
articles.description: If you are looking to buy an HDB flat in 2023, these HDB estates are likely to continue to command high prices based on these median prices
articles.content:

articles.description:
SINGAPORE - Land transport giant ComfortDelGro Corp posted a 40.2 per cent rise in net earnings for the year ended Dec 31, 2022, to $173.1 million.

articles.content:

articles.description:

articles.content:

articles.title: China-born billionaire Li Xiting whose fortune boomed during the pandemic is still Singapore’s richest man
articles.description: In the first years of the pandemic, his net worth grew by an estimated US$1 billion each month as the stock price of Mindray, China's largest medical equipment manufacturer, ascended during the bearish market.
articles.content:
